What sets us apart?
-Juniper only network with new equipment.
-Multi 100Gbps core network (1.2+ Tbps Total Capacity) with N+1 resiliency at minimum and diverse routing.
-Great peering at LINX, LONAP, AMS-IX, DE-CIX and all major local ISP’s.
-We transit with: Level3, Telia, NTT, GTT, TATA, ZAYO and Cogent which guarantees excellent connectivity - congestion free.
-LINX and LONAP partner - we can connect you to these exchanges with your own ASN.
-EU MPLS Network Spread over 7 data centres.
-Tier 3 Data centres in London, Amsterdam & Frankfurt.
-We aim at high quality for a reasonable price.
-Clouvider is an established UK based business. We just turned 6!

Yes, we have several options during the checkout process for our Xeon E3 & E systems. If you seek a different configuration please contact us.

How long for deployment?
Our standard delivery is within 3 working days. Custom configurations may take longer.

Yes, free VPN Secured IPMI access can be provided on request.

Yes, /64 or /48 subnets can be requested during the order process.

Open a sales ticket to discuss our custom solutions, happy to help where possible.
